reviewText: Handy for keeping going while away from our gym
Instructor is very good and gives clear directions for the different moves.  Her cheerful attitude is energizing.

Easy to follow and inspiring - this DVD is upbeat and has a easy to follow routine for standing or chair work
It hits all the right spots - cardio, strength and flexibility
I am a active senior and have worked out at home for many years and I would recommend this workout for active seniors or others who prefer a slower paced gentle non threatening work out that keeps you active and functional
